tidbits.title: Dual Nationality
tidbits.description: Saint Martin is divided between two nations: the French overseas collectivity of Saint-Martin and the Dutch constituent country of Sint Maarten, showcasing a unique blend of cultures.

tidbits.title: Spectacular Beaches
tidbits.description: The island boasts stunning beaches such as Maho Beach, famous for its proximity to the airport runway, offering a thrilling experience as planes land and take off overhead.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Saint Martin's cuisine is diverse and exquisite, with a fusion of French, Dutch, Caribbean, and international flavors, attracting food enthusiasts from around the globe.
